abstract.t: The BGP Monitoring Protocol (BMP) [RFC7854] is designed to monitor BGP [RFC4271] running status, such as BGP peer relationship establishment and termination and route updates. Without BMP, manual query is required if you want to know about BGP running status. This document provides the use cases that the BMP station can get the optional parameters that are supported by the monitored network device and default configure parameters of the monitored network device via BMP.
